page.title: 15PENNARD GOLF AND SQUASH CLUB
page.content: THE GOLF AND SQUASH CLUBS SHARE THE SAME FACILITIES, THE CLUB HOUSE BEING MAGNIFICENTLY SITED, OVERLOOKING THE SEA. THE GOLF CLUB HAS 350 SENIOR MEMBERS OF BOTH SEXES, AND 75 JUNIOR MEMBERS, WHILE THE SQUASH CLUB HAS 130 SENIOR AND 30 JUNIOR MEMBERS. GOLF MATCHES AND COMPETITIONS ARE HELD MOST WEEKS. THE CLUB HOUSE ITSELF IS A POPULAR SOCIAL VENUE FOR PEOPLE FROM A WIDE AREA HAVING AN ADDITIONAL 150 SOCIAL MEMBERS. IT OFFERS TWO BARS, A SMALL DINING AREA, SNOOKER AND BRIDGE ROOMS. OCCASIANAL ENTERTAINMENT AND SOCIAL EVENTS ARE HELD. ON SITE IS A SPORTS SHOP RUN BY THE GOLF PROFESSIONAL. WHEN I PLAY GOLF ON PENNARD GOLF COURSE I ONLY PLAY 4 HOLES WHICH ARE 1,2, 3, AND 9.IT TAKES ABOUT 2 HOURS TO PLAY 4 HOLES. IT IS VERY TIRING, AND WHEN IT IS RAINING I GET VERY WET.I SOMETIMES PLAY WITH MUM
